      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      User UserDAO.activateUser(User user)
      Activates the user so he/she can login.
      User UserDAO.addUser(User user)
      Adds user to database.
      User UserDAO.getUserByAccessCode(java.lang.String accessCode)
      Get user from DataStore using his/her accessCode
      User UserDAO.getUserByEmail(java.lang.String email)
      Returns the User associated with the given email address.
      User UserDAO.removeUser(User user)
      Deletes the user from the DataStore.
